verses.verse: וַיַּ֣רְא <S%H7200><s%> saw בִּלְעָ֗ם <S%H1109><s%> And when Balaam כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for ט֞וֹב <S%H2895><s%> be better בְּעֵינֵ֤י <S%H5869><s%> affliction יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD לְבָרֵ֣ךְ <S%H1288><s%> to bless אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not הָלַ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> he went כְּפַֽעַם־ <S%H6471><s%> not as at other times בְּפַ֖עַם <S%H6471><s%> times לִקְרַ֣את <S%H7125><s%> to seek נְחָשִׁ֑ים <S%H5173><s%> for enchantments וַיָּ֥שֶׁת <S%H7896><s%> but he set אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> toward הַמִּדְבָּ֖ר <S%H4057><s%> toward the wilderness פָּנָֽיו׃ <S%H6440><s%> his face

וַיִּשָּׂ֨א <S%H5375><s%> lifted up בִלְעָ֜ם <S%H1109><s%> And Balaam אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֵינָ֗יו <S%H5869><s%> his eyes וַיַּרְא֙ <S%H7200><s%> and he saw אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel שֹׁכֵ֖ן <S%H7931><s%> abiding לִשְׁבָטָ֑יו <S%H7626><s%> [in his tents] according to their tribes וַתְּהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> came עָלָ֖יו <S%H5921><s%> and ר֥וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> and the spirit אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> of God

וַיִּשָּׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> And he took up מְשָׁל֖וֹ <S%H4912><s%> his parable וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <S%H559><s%> and said נְאֻ֤ם <S%H5002><s%> hath said בִּלְעָם֙ <S%H1109><s%> Balaam בְּנ֣וֹ <S%H1121><s%> the son בְעֹ֔ר <S%H1160><s%> of Beor וּנְאֻ֥ם <S%H5002><s%> hath said הַגֶּ֖בֶר <S%H1397><s%> and the man שְׁתֻ֥ם <S%H8365><s%> are open הָעָֽיִן׃ <S%H5869><s%> whose eyes

נְאֻ֕ם <S%H5002><s%> He hath said שֹׁמֵ֖עַ <S%H8085><s%> which heard אִמְרֵי־ <S%H561><s%> the words אֵ֑ל <S%H410><s%> of God אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> Who מַחֲזֵ֤ה <S%H4236><s%> the vision שַׁדַּי֙ <S%H7706><s%> of the Almighty יֶֽחֱזֶ֔ה <S%H2372><s%> which saw נֹפֵ֖ל <S%H5307><s%> falling וּגְל֥וּי <S%H1540><s%> open עֵינָֽיִם׃ <S%H5869><s%> [into a trance] but having his eyes

מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> How טֹּ֥בוּ <S%H2895><s%> How goodly אֹהָלֶ֖יךָ <S%H168><s%> are thy tents יַעֲקֹ֑ב <S%H3290><s%> O Jacob מִשְׁכְּנֹתֶ֖יךָ <S%H4908><s%> [and] thy tabernacles יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> O Israel

כִּנְחָלִ֣ים <S%H5158><s%> As the valleys נִטָּ֔יוּ <S%H5186><s%> are they spread forth כְּגַנֹּ֖ת <S%H1593><s%> as gardens עֲלֵ֣י <S%H5921><s%> beside נָהָ֑ר <S%H5104><s%> by the river's side כַּאֲהָלִים֙ <S%H174><s%> as the trees of lign aloes נָטַ֣ע <S%H5193><s%> hath planted יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD כַּאֲרָזִ֖ים <S%H730><s%> [and] as cedar trees עֲלֵי־ <S%H5921><s%> beside מָֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> beside the waters

יִֽזַּל־ <S%H5140><s%> out מַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4325><s%> the water מִדָּ֣לְיָ֔ו <S%H1805><s%> of his buckets וְזַרְע֖וֹ <S%H2233><s%> and his seed בְּמַ֣יִם <S%H4325><s%> waters רַבִּ֑ים <S%H7227><s%> [shall be] in many וְיָרֹ֤ם <S%H7311><s%> shall be higher מֵֽאֲגַג֙ <S%H90><s%> than Agag מַלְכּ֔וֹ <S%H4428><s%> and his king וְתִנַּשֵּׂ֖א <S%H5375><s%> shall be exalted מַלְכֻתֽוֹ׃ <S%H4438><s%> and his kingdom

אֵ֚ל <S%H410><s%> God מוֹצִיא֣וֹ <S%H3318><s%> brought him forth מִמִּצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> out of Egypt כְּתוֹעֲפֹ֥ת <S%H8443><s%> he hath as it were the strength רְאֵ֖ם <S%H7214><s%> of an unicorn ל֑וֹ יֹאכַ֞ל <S%H398><s%> he shall eat up גּוֹיִ֣ם <S%H1471><s%> the nations צָרָ֗יו <S%H6862><s%> his enemies וְעַצְמֹתֵיהֶ֛ם <S%H6106><s%> their bones יְגָרֵ֖ם <S%H1633><s%> and shall break וְחִצָּ֥יו <S%H2671><s%> [them] through with his arrows יִמְחָֽץ׃ <S%H4272><s%> and pierce

כָּרַ֨ע <S%H3766><s%> He couched שָׁכַ֧ב <S%H7901><s%> he lay down כַּאֲרִ֛י <S%H738><s%> as a lion וּכְלָבִ֖יא <S%H3833><s%> and as a great lion מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> who יְקִימֶ֑נּוּ <S%H6965><s%> who shall stir him up מְבָרֲכֶ֣יךָ <S%H1288><s%> ? Blessed בָר֔וּךְ <S%H1288><s%> [is] he that blesseth וְאֹרְרֶ֖יךָ <S%H779><s%> thee and cursed אָרֽוּר׃ <S%H779><s%> [is] he that curseth

וַיִּֽחַר־ <S%H2734><s%> was kindled אַ֤ף <S%H639><s%> anger בָּלָק֙ <S%H1111><s%> And Balak's אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against בִּלְעָ֔ם <S%H1109><s%> against Balaam וַיִּסְפֹּ֖ק <S%H5606><s%> together אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כַּפָּ֑יו <S%H3709><s%> his hands וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said בָּלָ֜ק <S%H1111><s%> and Balak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against בִּלְעָ֗ם <S%H1109><s%> unto Balaam לָקֹ֤ב <S%H6895><s%> thee to curse אֹֽיְבַי֙ <S%H341><s%> mine enemies קְרָאתִ֔יךָ <S%H7121><s%> I called וְהִנֵּה֙ <S%H2009><s%> behold בֵּרַ֣כְתָּ <S%H1288><s%> and behold thou hast altogether בָרֵ֔ךְ <S%H1288><s%> blessed זֶ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> these שָׁלֹ֥שׁ <S%H7969><s%> [them] these three פְּעָמִֽים׃ <S%H6471><s%> times

וְעַתָּ֖ה <S%H6258><s%> now בְּרַח־ <S%H1272><s%> Therefore now flee לְךָ֣ אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מְקוֹמֶ֑ךָ <S%H4725><s%> thou to thy place אָמַ֙רְתִּי֙ <S%H559><s%> I thought כַּבֵּ֣ד <S%H3513><s%> thee unto great אֲכַבֶּדְךָ֔ <S%H3513><s%> honour וְהִנֵּ֛ה <S%H2009><s%> behold מְנָעֲךָ֥ <S%H4513><s%> hath kept thee back יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> but lo the LORD מִכָּבֽוֹד׃ <S%H3519><s%> from honour

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said בִּלְעָ֖ם <S%H1109><s%> And Balaam אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בָּלָ֑ק <S%H1111><s%> unto Balak הֲלֹ֗א <S%H3808><s%> not גַּ֧ם <S%H1571><s%> again אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about מַלְאָכֶ֛יךָ <S%H4397><s%> I not also to thy messengers אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whom שָׁלַ֥חְתָּ <S%H7971><s%> which thou sentest אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> about דִּבַּ֥רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> Spake לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> unto me saying

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> Though יִתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> would give לִ֨י בָלָ֜ק <S%H1111><s%> If Balak מְלֹ֣א <S%H4393><s%> full בֵיתוֹ֮ <S%H1004><s%> me his house כֶּ֣סֶף <S%H3701><s%> of silver וְזָהָב֒ <S%H2091><s%> and gold לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not אוּכַ֗ל <S%H3201><s%> I cannot לַעֲבֹר֙ <S%H5674><s%> go beyond אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פִּ֣י <S%H6310><s%> the commandment יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to do טוֹבָ֛ה <S%H2896><s%> [either] good א֥וֹ <S%H176><s%> or רָעָ֖ה <S%H7451><s%> or bad מִלִּבִּ֑י <S%H3820><s%> of mine own mind אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> What יְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> saith יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> [but] what the LORD אֹת֥וֹ <S%H853><s%> אֲדַבֵּֽר׃ <S%H1696><s%> that will I speak

וְעַתָּ֕ה <S%H6258><s%> and now הִנְנִ֥י <S%H2005><s%> behold הוֹלֵ֖ךְ <S%H1980><s%> And now behold I go לְעַמִּ֑י <S%H5971><s%> unto my people לְכָה֙ <S%H1980><s%> come אִיעָ֣צְךָ֔ <S%H3289><s%> [therefore and] I will advertise אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> what יַעֲשֶׂ֜ה <S%H6213><s%> shall do הָעָ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> thee what this people הַזֶּ֛ה <S%H2088><s%> this לְעַמְּךָ֖ <S%H5971><s%> to thy people בְּאַחֲרִ֥ית <S%H319><s%> in the latter הַיָּמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> days

וַיִּשָּׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> And he took up מְשָׁל֖וֹ <S%H4912><s%> his parable וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <S%H559><s%> and said נְאֻ֤ם <S%H5002><s%> hath said בִּלְעָם֙ <S%H1109><s%> Balaam בְּנ֣וֹ <S%H1121><s%> the son בְעֹ֔ר <S%H1160><s%> of Beor וּנְאֻ֥ם <S%H5002><s%> hath said הַגֶּ֖בֶר <S%H1397><s%> and the man שְׁתֻ֥ם <S%H8365><s%> are open הָעָֽיִן׃ <S%H5869><s%> whose eyes

נְאֻ֗ם <S%H5002><s%> He hath said שֹׁמֵ֙עַ֙ <S%H8085><s%> which heard אִמְרֵי־ <S%H561><s%> the words אֵ֔ל <S%H410><s%> of God וְיֹדֵ֖עַ <S%H3045><s%> and knew דַּ֣עַת <S%H1847><s%> the knowledge עֶלְי֑וֹן <S%H5945><s%> of the most High מַחֲזֵ֤ה <S%H4236><s%> the vision שַׁדַּי֙ <S%H7706><s%> of the Almighty יֶֽחֱזֶ֔ה <S%H2372><s%> [which] saw נֹפֵ֖ל <S%H5307><s%> falling וּגְל֥וּי <S%H1540><s%> open עֵינָֽיִם׃ <S%H5869><s%> [into a trance] but having his eyes

אֶרְאֶ֙נּוּ֙ <S%H7200><s%> I shall see וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not עַתָּ֔ה <S%H6258><s%> now אֲשׁוּרֶ֖נּוּ <S%H7789><s%> him but not now I shall behold וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not קָר֑וֹב <S%H7138><s%> him but not nigh דָּרַ֨ךְ <S%H1869><s%> there shall come כּוֹכָ֜ב <S%H3556><s%> a Star מִֽיַּעֲקֹ֗ב <S%H3290><s%> out of Jacob וְקָ֥ם <S%H6965><s%> shall rise שֵׁ֙בֶט֙ <S%H7626><s%> and a Sceptre מִיִּשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> out of Israel וּמָחַץ֙ <S%H4272><s%> and shall smite פַּאֲתֵ֣י <S%H6285><s%> the corners מוֹאָ֔ב <S%H4124><s%> of Moab וְקַרְקַ֖ר <S%H6979><s%> and destroy כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> all the children שֵֽׁת׃ <S%H8351><s%> Sheth

וְהָיָ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> become אֱד֜וֹם <S%H123><s%> And Edom יְרֵשָׁ֗ה <S%H3424><s%> shall be a possession וְהָיָ֧ה <S%H1961><s%> shall be a יְרֵשָׁ֛ה <S%H3424><s%> also shall be a possession שֵׂעִ֖יר <S%H8165><s%> Seir אֹיְבָ֑יו <S%H341><s%> for his enemies וְיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> and Israel עֹ֥שֶׂה <S%H6213><s%> shall do חָֽיִל׃ <S%H2428><s%> valiantly

וְיֵ֖רְדְּ <S%H7287><s%> shall come he that shall have dominion מִֽיַּעֲקֹ֑ב <S%H3290><s%> Out of Jacob וְהֶֽאֱבִ֥יד <S%H6><s%> and shall destroy שָׂרִ֖יד <S%H8300><s%> him that remaineth מֵעִֽיר׃ <S%H5892><s%> of the city

וַיַּרְא֙ <S%H7200><s%> And when he looked אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲמָלֵ֔ק <S%H6002><s%> on Amalek וַיִּשָּׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> he took up מְשָׁל֖וֹ <S%H4912><s%> his parable וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <S%H559><s%> and said רֵאשִׁ֤ית <S%H7225><s%> [was] the first גּוֹיִם֙ <S%H1471><s%> of the nations עֲמָלֵ֔ק <S%H6002><s%> Amalek וְאַחֲרִית֖וֹ <S%H319><s%> but his latter עֲדֵ֥י <S%H5703><s%> for ever אֹבֵֽד׃ <S%H8><s%> end [shall be] that he perish

וַיַּרְא֙ <S%H7200><s%> And he looked אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַקֵּינִ֔י <S%H7017><s%> on the Kenites וַיִּשָּׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> and took up מְשָׁל֖וֹ <S%H4912><s%> his parable וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <S%H559><s%> and said אֵיתָן֙ <S%H386><s%> Strong מֽוֹשָׁבֶ֔ךָ <S%H4186><s%> is thy dwellingplace וְשִׂ֥ים <S%H7760><s%> and thou puttest בַּסֶּ֖לַע <S%H5553><s%> in a rock קִנֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H7064><s%> thy nest

כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> shall יִהְיֶ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> become לְבָ֣עֵֽר <S%H1197><s%> be wasted קָ֑יִן <S%H7014><s%> Nevertheless the Kenite עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> long מָ֖ה <S%H4100><s%> How אַשּׁ֥וּר <S%H804><s%> until Asshur תִּשְׁבֶּֽךָּ׃ <S%H7617><s%> shall carry thee away captive

וַיִּשָּׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> And he took up מְשָׁל֖וֹ <S%H4912><s%> his parable וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <S%H559><s%> and said א֕וֹי <S%H188><s%> Alas מִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> who יִחְיֶ֖ה <S%H2421><s%> who shall live מִשֻּׂמ֥וֹ <S%H7760><s%> doeth אֵֽל׃ <S%H410><s%> when God

וְצִים֙ <S%H6716><s%> And ships מִיַּ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> [shall come] from the coast כִּתִּ֔ים <S%H3794><s%> of Chittim וְעִנּ֥וּ <S%H6031><s%> and shall afflict אַשּׁ֖וּר <S%H804><s%> Asshur וְעִנּוּ־ <S%H6031><s%> and shall afflict עֵ֑בֶר <S%H5677><s%> Eber וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> also ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he עֲדֵ֥י <S%H5703><s%> for ever אֹבֵֽד׃ <S%H8><s%> and he also shall perish

וַיָּ֣קָם <S%H6965><s%> rose up בִּלְעָ֔ם <S%H1109><s%> And Balaam וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> also went וַיָּ֣שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> and returned לִמְקֹמ֑וֹ <S%H4725><s%> to his place וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> also בָּלָ֖ק <S%H1111><s%> and Balak הָלַ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> went לְדַרְכּֽוֹ׃ <S%H1870><s%> his way פ
